ValidationRule.description: Checks if the Commercialisation Ready Summary field of the Engagement of Commercialisation record type is blank when changing the stage from Development to Commercialisation Ready.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Commercialisation', ISCHANGED(Stage_Name__c), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Stage_Name__c), "Development"), ISPICKVAL(Stage_Name__c, "Commercialisation Ready"), ISBLANK(Commercialisation_Ready_Summary__c) )
